str_c
```{r}
month <- c("3","4","5")
day <- c("11","5","2")
char1 <- c("月","月","月")
char2 <- c("日","日","日")
month
char1
day
char2
str_c(month,char1,day,char2)
```
```{r}
str_c(month,c("月"),day,c("日"))

str_c(month,"月",day,"天")

str_c(month,day, sep="月")
```
